title: Stranger Things star David Harbour and singer Lily Allen head out in NYC in black winter coats
text:
David Harbour and Lily Allen enjoyed a trip to Disney World last week with the British singer's two daughters from her former marriage.

But on Monday, the couple were back home in New York where they were spotted enjoying a stroll together.

Stranger Things star Harbour, 44, and Allen, 34, only went public with their romance a couple of weeks ago but it's clearly moving at a pace.

New couple: Stranger Things star David Harbour, 44, and British singer Lily Allen, 34, headed out for a stroll together in New York City on Monday

Allen shared with her social media followers earlier this month that she planned to relocate to New York until after Brexit happens in her native UK.

Then she was seen with Harbour at a party following the actor's hosting gig on NBC's Saturday Night Live on October 12.

She shared images of Harbour on SNL to her Instagram Stories and and alongside a close-up of his bulging biceps she added the word 'Mine'.

They were snapped in a very public display of affection on city streets a couple of days later before making their red carpet debut at a charity fundraising gala on October 17.

Simpatico: Harbour carried a book while Allen checked her phone and smoked a cigarette as they crossed a city street wearing matching colored winter coats

Going strong: The actor and the pop star were first linked romantically in London in August and a couple of weeks ago, Allen shared she was moving to New York until after UK's Brexit

Together: Harbour and Allen made their red carpet debut at a charity fundraising gala in New York on October 17

Last Tuesday, Allen shared pics to Instagram from a trip to Disney World in Florida in which she was dressed as Rapunzel from Tangled.

With her and Harbour were her daughters Ethel Mary, eight, and Marnie Rose, six, whom she shares with ex-husband Sam Cooper.

The little girls were also in costume - Ethel as Cinderella and Marnie as Princess Jasmine.

Allen and Harbour were first spotted together in public at a theatre performance in London in August.

Allen separated from Cooper in 2015 after about four years marriage. The former couple announced they finalized their divorce in 2018 and share joint custody of their children.

Harbour previously dated Fantastic Beasts star Alison Sudol with whom he was last seen in April at the premiere of his movie Hellboy.
